thread.section_title: SkyLux Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SkyLux Travel | www.skyluxtravel.com
thread.title: Myron

author: Myron
title: Myron
text: I am suspicious of most leading discount offers and find many to be come-ons for switch and bate tactix. I researched multiple rates for my planned trip and was appalled at my choices. Skylux offered me a price that was below all others I found and I entered my contact information with trepidation. Much to my pleasant surprise I received a telephone call from Zach at Skylux within an hour of my entering my data and he spent the next two days making sure I not only got the deep discount fare but also the extra services I need traveling with my wife in a wheelchair. Thank you Zach and Thank you Skylux for delivering not only a great air fare but for combining it with great service.
